Key Match Events: Shadab Khan produced a special all-round effort
Shaheen Shah Afridi (3/14) and Shadab (2/16) blew away the South African top order
South Africa missed the services of their ace batter David Miller
Miscellaneous Highlights: With the win, Pakistan (4 points) moved up to the third spot in group 2
While South Africa (5 points) continued to stay second behind leaders India (6 points)
Others: Earlier, Iftikhar Ahmed made 51 in 35 balls and anchored the innings after they were tottering at 43/4 in the seventh over
Anrich Nortje was the most successful bowler for South Africa with figures of 4/41
